flawed_nl_solution:
She has used 32 ounces on 8-ounce glasses because 4 x 8 = 32
She has used 30 ounces on the 5-ounce glasses because 6 x 5 = 30
She has used 66 ounces in total because 32 + 30 = <<32+30=66>>66
She has 56 ounces left because 122 - 66 = <<122-66=56>>56
She can fill fifteen four-ounce glasses because 56 / 4 = <<56/4=14>>14
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 62, not 66. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
